form.IN:
Oblika za pretekli deležnik je lahko
swelled
ali
swollen
.

sense.def:
To swell
ali
to swell up
pomeni, da nekaj postane večje in bolj okroglo, kot je normalno.

seg.quote: A mosquito had bitten her and her arm had swollen up.
The insect inflates her lungs so that they swell into her abdomen.
Her fingers were badly swollen with arthritis.
It took another twenty years for the population to swell to twice its size.
The army had its ranks swollen by new recruits.
The murmur swelled and then died away.

sense.def:
A swell
je enakomerno dviganje in upadanje valov na morju.
